name: Fluffy Vanilla Cake
author: Carla Maria
summary: Hey! Its Carla Bruno from Carla's Cakes! Looking for the ultimate vanilla cake recipe ever? Are you looking for a fluffy and easy vanilla cake? Are you looking for a delicious vanilla cake recipe? Well you have come to the right spot, because here is the the best fluffy vanilla cake recipe.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream sugar and butter together in a large bowl using an electric mixer until pale and fluffy, 6 to 7 minutes
Beat in eggs, 1 at a time
Combine flour and baking powder in a separate bowl
Add to butter mixture and mix well
Stir in milk until batter is smooth
Pour evenly into the prepared pans
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 30 minutes
